segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
segments.en: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has four qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and being ungrateful and thankless.

segments.pli: imehi … pe … kāyasucaritena, vacīsucaritena, manosucaritena kataññutākataveditā … pe ….
segments.en: An astute person … makes much merit. … Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and being grateful and thankful. …”

sections.title: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has four qualities…

suttaplex.blurb: Things that keep you spiritually healthy, including gratitude.
